reviews.text: We have just returned from 2 weeks at the Sea Change Villas in Rarotonga, Cook Islands. We stayed in a beachfront villa for the duration. The villa had the most amazing view of the ocean, was extremely private and very comfortable. The ocean was right at our doorstep. Definitely the right decision!
reviews.title: Perfection

reviews.text: My Husband and I recently spent 9 days at Sea Change Villas. We stayed in the beach front villa. This place is definately 5 star. From the moment we arrived Deb and Charlie welcomed us and helped us to organise our week of activites. They booked our resturants (with VIP treatment) through to our tours.
reviews.title: Magic Place

likes.liked: — the view and look of the room

reviews.text: The room itself was soooo beautiful. The view was amazing and so private. There were little touches throughout the villa. Fresh flowers everywhere; our own robes, a breakfast basket, books to read and even a sarong for us ladies. Our room was always clean and the four poster bed is the most comfortable bed I have ever slept in.The snorkelling and plunge pool are great and we enjoyed hiring our own BMW for the week (which is very reasonably priced). Bryce and I had a magic time. The only low point was the rainy weather for some days. But we did come in the rainy season so that can't be helped. It was always a nice warm temperature. The week before was apparently nothing but sunny.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What an amazing place to stay. I only have all positive things to say about SeaChange Villas. The owners Deb and Charlie were so kind and helpful. Nothing was too much trouble. They told us all the best places to eat and adventures to go on and there suggestions were always wonderful. We actually got married just outside villa number 2 which was just beautiful. Everything about the day was just what we wanted. We had a wedding package which meant everything was organised and all we really had to do was turn up and enjoy our day. We had a beautiful meal cooked in our villa by Mark which topped off a great day. The rooms and the view were amazing. The beach was so peaceful. We hardly saw other people while on the beach. It was like our own little paradise. The pool was an excellent refreshment as well. I would go back and stay there in a second and would definately recommend it to all.
reviews.title: A dream getaway
Perfect Romantic Getaway
reviews.text: I recently surprised my girlfriend with a birthday treat to Sea Change Villas, where I also planned to propose to her. The owners, Deb and Charlie, suggested a sunset BBQ dinner at our beachfront villa - where a personal chef cooked what was probably our most delicious meal on the island (thanks Mike!). Without their help, the moment would not have been as special or romantic. The villa (No. 1) was in immaculate condition, with a fantastic freshwater pool all to ourselves and a sundeck looking out over the lagoon. We also found the complimentary breakfast hamper substantial as it lasted us the 4 days of our stay. From the snorkelling and kayaking equipment to the full-sized kitchen, Sea Change provided for everything we needed. During Deb's "Island Orientation" she tailored her recommendations to our length of stay and our interests. Her knowledge of restaurants and great places to visit was impressive and extremely helpful in getting the most value out of our short stay. I could not recommend Sea Change Villas highly enough, we will definitely be back again!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We would recommend the Sea Change Villas to anyone. Staying here will make your Rarotonga experience easy, enjoyable, and unforgettable.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at Sea Change for 5 nights during the first week of March and our only disappointment was that we didn't stay longer! We stayed in a Plantation Villa which was fabulous. You still get a view of the ocean plus the beauty of the gardens around the villas. Our favorite part of course though was the freshwater pool that each villa has. It was perfect for lounging around in the afternoons. The villas themselves are outfitted with everything you could possibly need including a lovely basket of breakfast foods that the owners Deb and Charlie provide. The basket lasted us through the whole stay and we cooked lunch ourselves and would eat out at the restaurants at night. The food on the island is EXCELLENT. Swordfish (Broad Bill) is something we tried to eat every night. So tasty. Deb and Charlie were excellent hosts and they go well beyond what I would have expected. They provide helpful suggestions for restaurants as well as excursions. Oh, and make sure you show up for Joe's coconut demonstration!
reviews.title: Better Than We Imagined
Best Place in Cook Islands
reviews.text: This was by far the best holiday I've ever had and would recommend the Cook Islands and definitely Sea Change Villas to anyone. It's such a fantastic place!

My husband and I used South Seas Adventures out of Colorado to plan our honeymoon. Tree was our agent and she was fabulous! She was very honest and helped us plan a dream honeymoon that centered around what was important to us. We went to the Cook Islands and stayed at the Sea Changes Resort. The owners of the Sea Changes are a husband and wife who were beyond friendly and accomodating. They were sincerely interested in making our stay perfect. They were great at recommending restaurants and excursions. Our room had a beautiful four-poster bed and a dual shower heads, as well as our own private fresh water pool! The surrounding gardens were beautiful and very well taken care of. The beach was breathtaking and kayaks and snorkel equipment were provided free of charge. The island is so beautiful and the people were very friendly. The food was spectacular and there were many restaurants to visit with lots of different menus. We would highly recommend South Seas Adventures, the Cook Islands and the Sea Changes resort. We hope to return one day soon!
reviews.title: Paradise found.

description: Our award-winning South Seas retreat is nestled on its own secluded white sandy beach and is the perfect place to celebrate a special occasion, a romantic honeymoon or a relaxed yet luxurious holiday. There are nine spacious one, two and three bedroom fully self contained villas all enjoying their own private fresh water swimming pool, courtyard in either beach or lagoon view setting. During your stay you will have complimentary use of all equipment including bicycles, kayaks and snorkeling gear.Sea Change Villas provides an environment of casual elegance with every conceivable comfort for you, the discerning traveler to enjoy with outstanding guest service to match.
